medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Has had right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain on and off for the past year, with the last episode about a week ago. More recently, around 5 days ago, began experiencing new epigastric pain. No relation of either pain to eating. Symptoms are associated with lower back pain that has persisted for the last 6 months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Gastritis, esophagitis, GERD, prior alcohol use
medical_history.family_history: No liver disease, gallbladder disease, or cancer
